# gal-label



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                          | Type                                                               | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Palette aligned with the React implementation        | `"black" \| "error" \| "info" \| "sage" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'sage'`    |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | Optional Font Awesome class for the icon             | `string`                                                           | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Label size                                           | `"medium" \| "small"`                                              | `'medium'`  |
| `text`   | `text`    | Text rendered inside the label (fallback for no slot) | `string`                                                          | `'Label'`   |
